item.title: The unequal burden of the environemntal crisis
item.description: Early November I attended the Students for Zero Waste (SZW) 2018 Conference. Naturally, I expected to learn about waste, but I left with an entirely new perspective on the environmental and climate crises we face. When we think about making changes to our lifestyles for the benefit of the environment, we tend to only think of ourselves and how our modification or change will affect our lifestyle.
